info.title: Avalanche Indexer API
info.description: Avalanche Indexer API provides a series of endpoints for indexed data on Avalanche blockchain

get.description: Returns the list of all available endpoints

Returns the current service health

This endpoint is useful for automated service checks.
Returns the current service status along with node version and sync status
Returns network statistics for a given time period
Returns a list of all Avalanche assets
Returns asset details for a given ID
Returns a collection of active validators
Returns validator details and associated data

parameters.name: node_id
parameters.description: Filter delegations by validator node ID

parameters.name: reward_address
parameters.description: Filter delegations by a reward address

get.description: Returns block matching the search parameters
Returns block details by block hash
Returns transactions matching the search parameters

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by transaction type. Separate multiple values by comma.

parameters.name: start_height
parameters.description: Search range start block height (if applicable).

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Filter by account address. Separate multiple values by comma.

get.description: Returns transaction details for a given ID/hash
Returns transaction output details for a given ID
Returns available transaction types and their counts
